title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 383.1 - General issuance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 383.1 - General issuance

State Regulations

Each social services official must issue a payment access
card, in accordance with the specifications of the office, to any person who is
eligible for public assistance and to whom payment is to be made, except to a
recipient who is a resident in a medical or health-related
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
383.1

Amended

New

York State Register June 9, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 23, eff. 6/9/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
